description.en: A classical problem in risk theory - what is the ruin probability of an insurance company - is considered, using the model of collective risk. Then basic models of modern portfolio theory are covered, including Markowitz and capital asset pricing models (CAPM). VaR-methodology for measuring financial risks is introduced.
description.et: Tutvutakse riskiteooria klassikalise ülesandega, milleks on kindlustusseltsi laostumistõenäosuse uurimine kollektiivse riski mudeli abil. Seejärel käsitletakse kaasaegse portfelliteooria mudeleid, s.h. Markowitzi ning finantsvarade hindamise mudeleid. Tutvutakse VaR- metoodikaga riski mõõtmiseks.

objectives.en: 1. Overview of variety of risks in financial and insurance risks.
objectives.et: 1. anda ülevaade finants ja kindlustustööstuses esinevatest olulisematest riskidest,

objectives.en: 2.  To provide a mathematical basis for the study of risks (classical risk model) and various measures of risk.
objectives.et: 2. näidata matemaatika võimalusi mitmesuguste riskide mõõtmiseks ja haldamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: Passing through the module, a participant
1. understands the concept of risk and differentiates various types of risk in financial industry;
learning_outcomes.et: 1. mõistab riski olemust ja tunneb erinevaid riskiliike finants ja kindlustustööstuses;

learning_outcomes.en: 2. knows classical results of ruin theory and is able to apply them in solving practical problems;
learning_outcomes.et: 2. teab laostumisteooria klassikalisi tulemusi ja oskab neid rakendada praktiliste ülesannete lahendamisel;

learning_outcomes.en: 3. knows main principles of modern portfolio theory and the capital asset pricing model (CAPM);
learning_outcomes.et: 3. tunneb portfelliteooria põhiprintsiipe ning finantsvarade hindamise mudelit (CAPM);

learning_outcomes.en: 4. knows principles of VaR measures and is able to perform necessary calculations.
learning_outcomes.et: 4. teab VaR-metoodika aluseid ja oskab teha vastavaid arvutusi.

independent_work.et:
Home work: 46 hours
Assignment 1.  Computer simulation of the risk process.  
Assignment 2.  Comparison of  asymptotic results with exact results
Assignment 3. Return of the portfolio
Assignment 4. Portfolio frontier in case of two assets. 
Assignment 5. Properties of Markowitzi portfolio
Assignment 6. Application of VaR method.

Note:  Homework are due the beginning of next lecture.

description.et:
Kontrollitakse koduülesannete lahenduste korrektsust, mille alusel antakse iga ülesande eest maksimaalselt 2-4 punkti (olenevalt ülesande raskusastmest).
The correctness of solutions of homeworks is tested and maximum 2-4 credits (depending on the difficulty of the homework)  is given for each homework.

Koosneb teooria osast ja ülesannete lahendamise osast. 
Consists of theoretical part and problem solution part.

grade_preconditions.et:
The course ends with written examination which consists of theoretical part and problem solution part.  Access to the exam assumes that at least half of the homework is done.
Aine lõpeb kirjaliku eksamiga, mis koosneb teooria osast ja ülesannete lahendamise osast. Eksamile pääsemiseks peavad vähemalt pooled kodutööd olema lahendatud.

grade_evaluation.et:
The final grade is composed from examination paper (80%) and assignments (20%).
Eksamitulemus moodustub 80% ulatuses eksamitööst ja 20% ulatuses kodutöödest.

debt_elimination.et:
Second attempt can be made at the end of examination session or at the beginning of the next semester. 
Võlgnevust saab likvideerida järeleksamil eksamisessiooni  lõpus või uue semestri alguses

description.et:
1. Klassikaline riskiprotsess kindlustuses. Laostumine. Suhteline turvalisa.
     Classical risk process. Ruin. Relative safety loading

2. Integraalvõrrandi tuletamine laostumistõenäosuse jaoks.
     Derivation of integral equation for ruin probability

3. Laostumistõenäosus 0-algkapitali korral. Laostumistõenäosus eksponentjaotusega kahjunõuete korral.
    Ruin probability for zero initial capital. 	Ruin probability  for exponentially distributed claims

4. Taastumistüüpi võrrand ja selle asümptootiline lahend.
    Renewal equation and its asymptotic solution.

5.  Cramer-Lundbergi lähend laostumistõenäosusele.
     Cramér-Lundberg approximation to the ruin  probability

6.  Cramer-Lundbergi lähendi kokkulangevus täpse lahendiga eksponentjaotusega nõuete korral.
      Compatibility of exact solution with Cramér-Lundberg approximation in case of exponentially distributed claims

7. Lundbergi eksponent ja selle hinnangud.
     Lundberg exponent and its bounds.

9. Klassikalise riskiprotsesssi võimalikud üldistused.
    Generalizations of classical risk processes

10. Kahe barjääriga riskiprotsess.
       Risk processes with two barriers.

11. Finantsriskide tüübid. Riskide mõõtmine standardhälbe (dispersiooni) abil.  Riskide hajutamise näide.
      Types of financial risks. The principle of diversification

12. Markowitzi portfelliteooria. Portfelliraja võrrand. Rajaportfell.
      Types of financial risks. The principle of diversification

13. Riskivaba vara lisamine portfelli. Kapitalituru sirge.
	Introduction of risk-free asset into the portfolio.  Capital Market Line

14.	Finantsvara hindamise mudel (turuportfell, aktiva beeta-kordaja,  börsisirge)
	Capital Asset Pricing Model CAPM (market portfolio, asset’s beta, Security Market Line)

15. Riski all oleva väärtuse hindamine VAR meetodil.
	Value at Risk methodology

16. Keskmine suurkahju. Koherentsed riskimõõdud.
	Expected shortfall. Coherent risk measures
